languages.text: "{name}, ты очнул{mf|ся|ась}". {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает от собственных слов, осознав, что впервые обратилась к вам по имени.{/n} "Твоя душа сияет слишком ярко для человека, несмотря на весь хлам, что скопился в твоей душе. От хлама можно избавиться, но вот свет... Постарайся сохранить его в себе, {name}. Он притягивает взгляд, подобно ярким звездам на небосклоне".

"{name}, you are awake." {n}Yrliet starts at her own words, realising that this is the first time she has ever called you by your name.{/n} "Your soul shines too radiantly for a human, despite all the litter that had accumulated in your soul. You can get rid of litter, but the light... Try to preserve it, {name}. It draws the eye like bright stars in the night sky."
languages.original_text: "{name}, ты очнул{mf|ся|ась}". {n}Ирлиэт вздрагивает от собственных слов, осознав, что впервые обратилась к вам по имени.{/n} "Твоя душа сияет слишком ярко для человека, несмотря на весь хлам, что скопился в твоей душе. От хлама можно избавиться, но вот свет... Постарайся сохранить его в себе, {name}. Он притягивает взгляд, подобно ярким звездам на небосклоне".

You can get rid of trash, but the light... Try to save it, {name}. It catches the eye like the bright stars in the night sky,"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

You can get rid of litter, but the light... Try to preserve it, {name}. It draws the eye like bright stars in the night sky."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “{name}，你醒了。”{n}伊莉耶特顿了顿，意识到这是自己第一次直呼你的名字。{/n}“尽管你的灵魂中不乏垃圾糟粕，但它依旧闪烁着其他人类无可企及的耀眼光芒。垃圾可以清理，但光芒……请你保住你的光芒，{name}。你的光芒就像黑夜中的群星一样明亮。”
languages.original_text: "{name}, you are awake." {n}Yrliet starts at her own words, realising that this is the first time she has ever called you by your name.{/n} "Your soul shines too radiantly for a human, despite all the litter that had accumulated in your soul. You can get rid of litter, but the light... Try to preserve it, {name}. It draws the eye like bright stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: “{name}，你醒了。”{n}伊莉耶特顿了顿，意识到这是自己第一次直呼你的名字。{/n}“尽管你的灵魂中不乏垃圾糟粕，但它依旧闪烁着其他人类无可企及的耀眼光芒。垃圾可以清理，但光芒……请你保住你的光芒，{name}。你的光芒就像黑夜中的群星一样明亮。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «{name}, estás {mf|despierto|despierta}». {n}Yrliet se sorprende al oír sus propias palabras, percatándose de que es la primera vez que te llama por tu nombre.{/n} «Tu alma resplandece con mucha intensidad para ser humana, a pesar de toda la basura que acumulas en ella. De la basura te puedes deshacer, pero la luz... Procura conservarla, {name}. Capta la mirada como una estrella fulgurante en el firmamento nocturno».
languages.original_text: "{name}, you are awake." {n}Yrliet starts at her own words, realising that this is the first time she has ever called you by your name.{/n} "Your soul shines too radiantly for a human, despite all the litter that had accumulated in your soul. You can get rid of litter, but the light... Try to preserve it, {name}. It draws the eye like bright stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: «{name}, estás {mf|despierto|despierta}». {n}Yrliet se sorprende al oír sus propias palabras, percatándose de que es la primera vez que te llama por tu nombre.{/n} «Tu alma resplandece con mucha intensidad para ser humana, a pesar de toda la basura que acumulas en ella. De la basura te puedes deshacer, pero la luz... Procura conservarla, {name}. Capta la mirada como una estrella fulgurante en el firmamento nocturno».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « {name}, vous êtes {mf|réveillé|réveillée}. » {n}Yrliet sursaute en réalisant qu'elle vient de vous appeler par votre prénom pour la toute première fois.{/n} « Votre âme est radieuse pour celle d'{mf|un humain|une humaine}, et malgré tous les déchets qui s'y sont accumulés. Je peux vous aider à évacuer ces déchets, mais pour la lumière... Tâchez de la préserver, {name}. Elle attire le regard comme les étoiles qui brillent dans le ciel nocturne. »
languages.original_text: "{name}, you are awake." {n}Yrliet starts at her own words, realising that this is the first time she has ever called you by your name.{/n} "Your soul shines too radiantly for a human, despite all the litter that had accumulated in your soul. You can get rid of litter, but the light... Try to preserve it, {name}. It draws the eye like bright stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: « {name}, vous êtes {mf|réveillé|réveillée}. » {n}Yrliet sursaute en réalisant qu'elle vient de vous appeler par votre prénom pour la toute première fois.{/n} « Votre âme est radieuse pour celle d'{mf|un humain|une humaine}, et malgré tous les déchets qui s'y sont accumulés. Je peux vous aider à évacuer ces déchets, mais pour la lumière... Tâchez de la préserver, {name}. Elle attire le regard comme les étoiles qui brillent dans le ciel nocturne. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "{name}, Ihr seid wach." {n}Yrliet erschrickt über ihre eigenen Worte, als sie erkennt, dass sie dich zum allerersten Mal bei deinem Namen genannt hat.{/n} "Eure Seele erstrahlt zu sehr für einen Menschen, trotz des ganzen Abfalls, der sich in Eurer Seele angesammelt hatte. Den Abfall könnt Ihr loswerden, aber das Licht ... Versucht, es zu erhalten, {name}. Es zieht den Blick an wie helle Sterne am Nachthimmel."
languages.original_text: "{name}, you are awake." {n}Yrliet starts at her own words, realising that this is the first time she has ever called you by your name.{/n} "Your soul shines too radiantly for a human, despite all the litter that had accumulated in your soul. You can get rid of litter, but the light... Try to preserve it, {name}. It draws the eye like bright stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: "{name}, Ihr seid wach." {n}Yrliet erschrickt über ihre eigenen Worte, als sie erkennt, dass sie dich zum allerersten Mal bei deinem Namen genannt hat.{/n} "Eure Seele erstrahlt zu sehr für einen Menschen, trotz des ganzen Abfalls, der sich in Eurer Seele angesammelt hatte. Den Abfall könnt Ihr loswerden, aber das Licht ... Versucht, es zu erhalten, {name}. Es zieht den Blick an wie helle Sterne am Nachthimmel."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}、目が覚めたのだな」{n}ユリエットは自分の言葉に驚き、あなたを初めて名前で呼んだことに気づく。{/n}「不純物だらけにもかかわらず、お前の魂は人間にしてはあまりにも輝いている。不純物は取り除けるが、光は…なるべく守るようにしろ、{name}。夜空の明るい星のように目を引くからな」
languages.original_text: "{name}, you are awake." {n}Yrliet starts at her own words, realising that this is the first time she has ever called you by your name.{/n} "Your soul shines too radiantly for a human, despite all the litter that had accumulated in your soul. You can get rid of litter, but the light... Try to preserve it, {name}. It draws the eye like bright stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、目が覚めたのだな」{n}ユリエットは自分の言葉に驚き、あなたを初めて名前で呼んだことに気づく。{/n}「不純物だらけにもかかわらず、お前の魂は人間にしてはあまりにも輝いている。不純物は取り除けるが、光は…なるべく守るようにしろ、{name}。夜空の明るい星のように目を引くからな」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Uyanmışsın {name}." {n}Yrliet, konuşmaya başlayınca sana ilk kez adınla seslendiğini fark ediyor.{/n} "Ruhun bir insana göre çok parlak, hem de biriktirdiği tüm pisliklere rağmen. O pisliklerden kurtulabilirsin ama ışığını... Işığını koru {name}. Geceleri göklerde parlayan parlak yıldızlar gibisin."
languages.original_text: "{name}, you are awake." {n}Yrliet starts at her own words, realising that this is the first time she has ever called you by your name.{/n} "Your soul shines too radiantly for a human, despite all the litter that had accumulated in your soul. You can get rid of litter, but the light... Try to preserve it, {name}. It draws the eye like bright stars in the night sky."

traits.locale_text: "Uyanmışsın {name}." {n}Yrliet, konuşmaya başlayınca sana ilk kez adınla seslendiğini fark ediyor.{/n} "Ruhun bir insana göre çok parlak, hem de biriktirdiği tüm pisliklere rağmen. O pisliklerden kurtulabilirsin ama ışığını... Işığını koru {name}. Geceleri göklerde parlayan parlak yıldızlar gibisin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
